title: Basshunter
summary: Jonas Erik Altberg (Swedish pronunciation: [ˈjûːnas ˈêːrɪk ˈâltbærj]; born 22 December 1984 in Halmstad), better known by his stage name Basshunter (also stylised as BassHunter),[1] is a Swedish singer, record producer and DJ. He began producing music under the stage name "Basshunter" in 2001.
